Html:
Hi

I'm trying to put a postal address into one cell with carriage returns.  I've tried

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValue("N{$myRowNum}", trim($row_Recordset1['address1item1']) . '\n' . trim($row_Recordset1['address1item2']) . '\n' . trim($row_Recordset1['address1item3']));

but I just endup with the string \n in the cell.

I've also tried \r\n with the same result.

Help appreciated.

I've added

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle("N{$myRowNum}")->getAlignment()->setWrapText(true);

but this made no difference.

When I right click on the cell in Excel wrap text is ticked for this cell

My mistake!!

Used single quotes  . '\n' . instead of double quotes . "\n" . so php was printing the literal \n

If you read this post apologies for wasting your time but take comfort in the fact I've wasted even more time by my stupidity.

Regards

Mark
